name: core
description: Monorepo for Verii core. Includes common modules, registrar endpoints, credential agent, mock vendor builds
author: Andres Olave

scripts.contracts:build:hardhat: pnpm --filter @verii/permissions-contract run build:hardhat && pnpm --filter @verii/verification-coupon-contract run build:hardhat && pnpm --filter @verii/metadata-registry-contract run build:hardhat && pnpm --filter @verii/revocation-list-contract run build:hardhat
scripts.contracts:clean:hardhat: pnpm --filter @verii/permissions-contract run clean:hardhat && pnpm --filter @verii/verification-coupon-contract run clean:hardhat && pnpm --filter @verii/metadata-registry-contract run clean:hardhat && pnpm --filter @verii/revocation-list-contract run clean:hardhat
scripts.contracts:test: pnpm --filter @verii/permissions-contract run test && pnpm --filter @verii/verification-coupon-contract run test && pnpm --filter @verii/metadata-registry-contract run test && pnpm --filter @verii/revocation-list-contract run test
scripts.contracts:deploy:hardhat: pnpm run contracts:assert-target-env && pnpm --filter @verii/permissions-contract run hardhat:deploy && pnpm --filter @verii/verification-coupon-contract run hardhat:deploy && pnpm --filter @verii/metadata-registry-contract run hardhat:deploy && pnpm --filter @verii/revocation-list-contract run hardhat:deploy
scripts.contracts:upgrade:hardhat: pnpm run contracts:assert-target-env && pnpm --filter @verii/permissions-contract run hardhat:upgrade && pnpm --filter @verii/verification-coupon-contract run hardhat:upgrade && pnpm --filter @verii/metadata-registry-contract run hardhat:upgrade && pnpm --filter @verii/revocation-list-contract run hardhat:upgrade
scripts.contracts:test:post-upgrade: pnpm run contracts:assert-target-env && pnpm --filter @verii/permissions-contract run test:post-upgrade && pnpm --filter @verii/verification-coupon-contract run test:post-upgrade && pnpm --filter @verii/metadata-registry-contract run test:post-upgrade && pnpm --filter @verii/revocation-list-contract run test:post-upgrade
scripts.check-packages: pnpm run clean && pnpm run compile && pnpm run test && pnpm run lint
scripts.check-licenses: pnpm licenses list --prod --json | grep table | node ./check-license.js
